title: Writing Medical Education (CME) Papers: Systematic Self-Directed Learning and Multimedia Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Familiarity with basic medical terminology and no experience in academic paper writing
context.additional_context: Online Course for Strengthening CME Paper Writing Competencies for Practicing Medical Professionals

learning_goals: Learners understand the structured framework (introduction-methods-results-discussion) of CME papers and explain core elements for each section in approximately 500 characters.
Learners can write one draft (1,500 characters) of a CME paper incorporating peer feedback using the instructed self-directed learning strategies.
Learners can produce CME content combining research findings with visual elements by utilizing multimedia materials (infographics, video lectures) within the LMS.

resources: CME (Continuing Medical Education) Paper Template & Checklist

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
